item.title: New Mexico United
item.description: /c/New Mexico United on support.futbol [home] [/c/newmexicounited ðŸŒŽ] [support.futbol] Description #### NMU Related * [Official Site](https://www.newmexicoutd.com) * [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/NewMexicoUTD/) * [The Curse NM](https://cursenm.com) * [Sandianistas](https://twitter.com/Sandianistas) * [Discord Server](https://discord.gg/bJu9uUrp) * [Matrix Space invite](https://matrix.to/#/#new-mexico-united:matrix.org) ##### 2023 Calendar Links * [ical](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/ical/97ih0490t7jqh3m65hakgdld1o%40group.calendar.google.com/public/basic.ics) * [Google Calendar](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/0/embed?src=97ih0490t7jqh3m65hakgdld1o@group.calendar.google.com&ctz=America/Denver) ![](https://support.futbol/pictrs/image/97763d81-2e4c-4d82-98cd-a0f8dba90092.png) Details Activity Count Subscribers 2 Posts 2 Comments 0 Daily Active Users 1 Weekly Active Users 1 Monthly Active Users 1 Activity Date Published 2023-06-14 22:49:34 Updated 2023-06-15 17:03:01 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:32
